term.title: half-chair

item.text: The conformation of a six-membered ring structure in which four contiguous atoms are in a plane and the other two atoms lie on opposite sides of the plane. [image: Not defined]

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2193. 'Basic terminology of stereochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2209 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122193)
